briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom device data structure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called on app startup, reload, restart etc to initialize non-zero data.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom device(s).

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called at initialization and allows the custom layer to provide specific functionality to initialize internal objects.
if successful, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to uninitialize custom device(s).

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called in preparation for loading a new configuration, allowing the custom layer to do whatever it needs with the current configuration before reconfiguration, if anything. Also, called in cleanup to close and uninitialize device resources.
if successful, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Custom function to initialize custom events.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called in init event before CFE_EVS_Register to add custom events to the event filter table.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: This function must be defined, but not all custom layers will do anything in this function.
number of events written to the filter table and -1 for failure i.e. CFE_EVS_MAX_EVENT_FILTERS reached.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sets the scale of the accelerometer.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.

parameterdescription.para: The divider for the scale set.

simplesect.para: for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function sets the scale of the gyroscope.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.

parameterdescription.para: The divider for the scale set.

simplesect.para: for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads raw X-axis, Y-axis, and Z-axis gyro data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads raw X-axis, Y-axis, and Z-axis accel data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads raw X-axis, Y-axis, and Z-axis mag data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.Read raw temperature data.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads raw temperature data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function reads raw temperature data.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: None.

briefdescription.para: Read the mag sensitivity adjustment values.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Reads the sensitivity adjustment values of the mag (AK8963).

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.Apply the platform rotation to measurements.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This applies any required platform rotation to the X, Y, and Z measurements.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.

briefdescription.para: Returns the device ID of the MPU9250.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This returns the device ID for identification.

simplesect.title: Assumptions, External Events, and Notes:
simplesect.para: Initialization must be completed before this function is called.
for success, FALSE for failure.
